fixes.name: Products Above Threshold
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR FixedProductSales =
    CALCULATE(
        SUM('order_items+'[LineTotal]),
        ALLEXCEPT('order_items+', 'order_items+'[ProductID])
    )
VAR Threshold = SELECTEDVALUE('Min Sales Threshold'[Display As])
RETURN
    FixedProductSales >= Threshold
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the FIXED LOD ({ FIXED [ProductID] : SUM([LineTotal]) }) to a CALCULATE with ALLEXCEPT to remove all filters except ProductID, mapped SUM to SUM, and replaced the Tableau parameter with SELECTEDVALUE('Min Sales Threshold'[Display As]). The measure returns a boolean comparing the fixed product-level sales to the selected parameter threshold.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The Tableau expression uses a FIXED LOD (aggregate across ProductID) and references a parameter; LOD expressions and parameter-based logic must be implemented as a measure in DAX.
